title: LSTM and GRU creases segmentation fault on inputing wrong order of hidden variable
body_html:
Specifications

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.0
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Pip
  • Python version: Python 3.5.2 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: V8.0.61
  • Other: NA

If we input 'batch,sequence, dimension' instead of 'sequence, batch, dimension' in a LSTM or a GRU, it generates a segmentation fault on GPU. The more scary part is that this code runs fine on CPU but most likely produces a wrong output.

Reproduce (CPU) - runs fine but it should throw an error (SERIOUS)

lstm = nn.LSTM(20,30)
X = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,20))
hidden_temp = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,30))
hidden = (hidden_temp, hidden_temp)
_,_ = lstm(X.transpose(0,1),hidden)

Reproduce (GPU) - breaks by generating a segmentation fault and pointer error but it should generate an error

lstm = nn.LSTM(20,30).cuda()
X = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,20)).cuda()
hidden_temp = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,30)).cuda()
hidden = (hidden_temp, hidden_temp)
_,_ = lstm(X.transpose(0,1),hidden)

Here is the error log in case of GPU https://pastebin.com/u9wkGZ9P

Thanks

body:
Specifications
- PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
- PyTorch version: 0.3.0
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Pip
- Python version: Python 3.5.2 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)
- CUDA/cuDNN version: V8.0.61
- Other: NA

If we input **'batch,sequence, dimension'** instead of **'sequence, batch, dimension'** in a LSTM or a GRU, it generates a segmentation fault on GPU. The more scary part is that this code runs fine on CPU but most likely produces a wrong output. 

### Reproduce (CPU) - runs fine but it should throw an error (SERIOUS)
```
lstm = nn.LSTM(20,30)
X = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,20))
hidden_temp = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,30))
hidden = (hidden_temp, hidden_temp)
_,_ = lstm(X.transpose(0,1),hidden)
```
### Reproduce (GPU) - breaks by generating a segmentation fault and pointer error but it should generate an error
```
lstm = nn.LSTM(20,30).cuda()
X = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,20)).cuda()
hidden_temp = Variable(torch.rand(1,100,30)).cuda()
hidden = (hidden_temp, hidden_temp)
_,_ = lstm(X.transpose(0,1),hidden)

```

Here is the error log in case of GPU https://pastebin.com/u9wkGZ9P

Thanks
